snippet.title: Zap!2000c PalmOS top-down arcade shoot-em-up demo gameplay
snippet.description:
Zap! is a top-down arcade shoot-em-up in space featuring numerous enemies and bosses to contend with across multiple levels. Its first iteration, simply titled Zap!, was first published in 1999 for Palm OS 3.x devices, but later received a full-color remake called Zap! 2000. An enhanced version of this remake, Zap! 2016, was later released with improved graphics and sound in 2003.
(https://palmdb.net/app/astraware-zap)

Comment to see the full gameplay, or if you want a video tutorial on how you can play this too on your web browser/smartphone.

Download Mu Emulator files: https://palmdb.net/app/mu
Download game files: https://palmdb.net/app/astraware-zap
Web Emulator: https://cloudpilot-emu.github.io/

Credit to this blog post that helped me figure out how I can play the game: https://blog.gingerbeardman.com/2022/10/03/playing-hanafuda-on-palm-os/
